name: Longsword - Tabletop Tactics
description: Longsword is a game of hardcore turn-based tactical combat. Build decks of spells and miniatures to fight against humans or the AI in skirmishes and campaigns. Earn cards through play or just pay once for the whole set.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows (64bits only) 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: i3 4th generation / i5 2nd generation / A6 series Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon 5800 series / NVidia 550Ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i3 5th generation (or newer) / i5 3rd generation (or newer) / FX4170 (or newer) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon 8000 series or newer / NVidia GTX 660 or newer DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: Recommended Resolution: 1920 x 1080
